title: nth number
text:
Given two numbers a and b, you have to find n-th number which is divisible by a or b.InputFirst line contains an integer T (≤ 100000), denoting number of test cases.Second line contains 3 positive integers a, b and n. (a, b ≤ 10000, n ≤ 1000000000)OutputPrint n-th number in a new line.ExampleInput:1
2 3 10Output:15
